item.title: Visualizing box office revenue by genre
item.description: After having watched Justice League in cinema, I was impressed by all of the special effects and how good they were. I started wondering myself: How much does a movie like that cost? And most importantly, how big is the box-office revenue for this kind of blockbuster? I found an answer in The Numbers. I have then decided to make a database from the data available on this website. I have retrieved the 500th biggest movie budgets.
